Uses of Package
sorcer.tools.shell

  • Packages that use sorcer.tools.shell 
    Package Description
    sorcer.tools.shell
    A SORCER Network SHell (nsh) provides a command line interface for interfacing with the SORCER environment.
    sorcer.tools.shell.cmds  
  • Classes in sorcer.tools.shell used by sorcer.tools.shell 
    Class and Description
    INetworkShell 
    LoaderConfiguration
    Class used to configure a RootLoader from a stream or by using it's methods.
    NetworkShell 
    ShellCmd
